remarks: Exchange an existential quantifier with two substitutions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by NM, 24-Aug-2018.)
statement:
2sbcrex $p |- ( [. A / a ]. [. B / b ]. E. c e. C ph <-> E. c e. C [. A / a ]. [. B / b ]. ph ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d C a $.
$d C b $.
$d a c $.
$d b c $.
